content.json:
# TaktMate Production Business Metrics Dashboard

Comprehensive business intelligence and user behavior analysis for TaktMate production environment. This workbook tracks key business metrics, user journeys, conversion rates, and operational KPIs.

content.query:
let timeGrain = case(
    {TimeRange:end} - {TimeRange:start} <= 1d, 1h,
    {TimeRange:end} - {TimeRange:start} <= 7d, 6h,
    1d
);
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name in ('CSV_FILE_UPLOADED', 'USER_REGISTRATION', 'USER_LOGIN', 'CHAT_INTERACTION', 'CSV_ANALYSIS_COMPLETED', 'EXPORT_GENERATED')
| extend BusinessValue = case(
    name == 'USER_REGISTRATION', 150,
    name == 'CSV_FILE_UPLOADED', 100,
    name == 'CSV_ANALYSIS_COMPLETED', 90,
    name == 'EXPORT_GENERATED', 80,
    name == 'CHAT_INTERACTION', 75,
    name == 'USER_LOGIN', 50,
    25
)
| summarize 
    EventCount = count(),
    TotalBusinessValue = sum(BusinessValue),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.userId))
    by bin(timestamp, timeGrain), name
| order by timestamp desc
content.title: Business Events Timeline

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name startswith 'USER_JOURNEY_'
| extend JourneyName = extract(@'USER_JOURNEY_([^_]+)', 1, name)
| extend Step = tostring(customDimensions.step)
| extend Success = tobool(customDimensions.success)
| extend ConversionScore = todouble(customMeasurements.conversionScore)
| summarize 
    TotalSteps = count(),
    SuccessfulSteps = countif(Success),
    AverageConversionScore = avg(ConversionScore),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.userId))
    by JourneyName, Step
| extend ConversionRate = (SuccessfulSteps * 100.0) / TotalSteps
| order by JourneyName, AverageConversionScore desc
content.title: User Journey Conversion Funnel

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == 'CSV_FILE_UPLOADED'
| extend FileSize = todouble(customMeasurements.fileSizeBytes)
| extend ProcessingTime = todouble(customMeasurements.processingTimeMs)
| extend RowCount = todouble(customMeasurements.rowCount)
| extend SizeCategory = case(
    FileSize < 10240, 'Small (<10KB)',
    FileSize < 102400, 'Medium (10KB-100KB)',
    FileSize < 1048576, 'Large (100KB-1MB)',
    'Extra Large (>1MB)'
)
| summarize 
    FileCount = count(),
    AverageFileSize = avg(FileSize),
    AverageProcessingTime = avg(ProcessingTime),
    AverageRowCount = avg(RowCount),
    TotalDataProcessed = sum(FileSize)
    by bin(timestamp, 1h), SizeCategory
| order by timestamp desc
content.title: CSV Processing Analytics

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == 'CHAT_INTERACTION'
| extend ResponseTime = todouble(customMeasurements.responseTime)
| extend TokensUsed = todouble(customMeasurements.tokensUsed)
| extend InteractionType = tostring(customDimensions.interactionType)
| extend Success = tobool(customDimensions.success)
| summarize 
    TotalInteractions = count(),
    SuccessfulInteractions = countif(Success),
    AverageResponseTime = avg(ResponseTime),
    TotalTokensUsed = sum(TokensUsed),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.userId))
    by bin(timestamp, 1h), InteractionType
| extend SuccessRate = (SuccessfulInteractions * 100.0) / TotalInteractions
| order by timestamp desc
content.title: AI Chat Performance Metrics

content.query:
dependencies
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where target contains 'openai.com'
| extend TokensUsed = todouble(customMeasurements.tokensUsed)
| extend Cost = todouble(customMeasurements.estimatedCost)
| summarize 
    APIRequests = count(),
    SuccessfulRequests = countif(success),
    AverageResponseTime = avg(duration),
    P95ResponseTime = percentile(duration, 95),
    TotalTokensUsed = sum(TokensUsed),
    EstimatedTotalCost = sum(Cost)
    by bin(timestamp, 1h)
| extend 
    SuccessRate = (SuccessfulRequests * 100.0) / APIRequests,
    CostPerRequest = EstimatedTotalCost / APIRequests
| order by timestamp desc
content.title: OpenAI API Usage & Cost Analysis

content.query:
let errorEvents = exceptions
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| extend ErrorCategory = case(
    type contains 'Auth', 'Authentication',
    type contains 'Validation', 'Validation',
    type contains 'Network', 'Network',
    type contains 'External', 'External Service',
    'Application'
)
| extend Severity = case(
    severityLevel >= 3, 'Critical',
    severityLevel >= 2, 'Error',
    severityLevel >= 1, 'Warning',
    'Info'
)
| summarize ErrorCount = count() by bin(timestamp, 1h), ErrorCategory, Severity;
let totalRequests = requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| summarize RequestCount = count() by bin(timestamp, 1h);
errorEvents
| join kind=leftouter totalRequests on timestamp
| extend ErrorRate = (ErrorCount * 100.0) / RequestCount
| project timestamp, ErrorCategory, Severity, ErrorCount, ErrorRate
| order by timestamp desc
content.title: Error Analysis & Impact

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name startswith 'SECURITY_'
| extend EventType = extract(@'SECURITY_([^_]+)', 1, name)
| extend RiskLevel = tostring(customDimensions.riskLevel)
| extend RiskScore = todouble(customMeasurements.riskScore)
| summarize 
    SecurityEvents = count(),
    AverageRiskScore = avg(RiskScore),
    MaxRiskScore = max(RiskScore),
    UniqueIPs = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.clientIP)),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.userId))
    by bin(timestamp, 1h), EventType, RiskLevel
| order by timestamp desc, AverageRiskScore desc
content.title: Security Events & Risk Assessment

content.query:
let businessKPIs = customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name in ('CSV_FILE_UPLOADED', 'USER_REGISTRATION', 'CHAT_INTERACTION', 'EXPORT_GENERATED')
| extend BusinessValue = case(
    name == 'USER_REGISTRATION', 150,
    name == 'CSV_FILE_UPLOADED', 100,
    name == 'EXPORT_GENERATED', 80,
    name == 'CHAT_INTERACTION', 75,
    25
)
| summarize 
    TotalEvents = count(),
    TotalBusinessValue = sum(BusinessValue),
    UniqueUsers = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.userId))
    by name;
let performanceKPIs = requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| summarize 
    TotalRequests = count(),
    AverageResponseTime = avg(duration),
    P95ResponseTime = percentile(duration, 95),
    SuccessRate = (countif(success) * 100.0) / count();
let costKPIs = dependencies
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where target contains 'openai.com'
| summarize 
    EstimatedCost = sum(todouble(customMeasurements.estimatedCost)),
    TokensUsed = sum(todouble(customMeasurements.tokensUsed));
businessKPIs
| extend KPIType = 'Business'
| project KPIType, Metric = name, Value = TotalEvents, SecondaryValue = TotalBusinessValue
| union (
    performanceKPIs
    | extend KPIType = 'Performance'
    | project KPIType, Metric = 'Total Requests', Value = TotalRequests, SecondaryValue = AverageResponseTime
    | union (
        performanceKPIs
        | extend KPIType = 'Performance'
        | project KPIType, Metric = 'Success Rate (%)', Value = SuccessRate, SecondaryValue = P95ResponseTime
    )
)
| union (
    costKPIs
    | extend KPIType = 'Cost'
    | project KPIType, Metric = 'OpenAI Cost ($)', Value = EstimatedCost, SecondaryValue = TokensUsed
)
| order by KPIType, Metric
content.title: Production KPI Summary
